name: Bowron Lake Provincial Park Recreational Map
categories: Bowron Lake Provincial Park Recreational Map
description: A topographic, full colour map of the Bowron Lake Provincial Park in British Columbia, Canada. Featuring relief shading and topographic contour lines, this map includes roadways, camp sites, hiking trails, portages, shelters and more. It also includes an index of campsite sizes that denote how many sites are within each campground. This map is folded.
